Html:
I hear people using a new trinket for mages. How can those items be unlocked?

I'm interested in seeing the result of 2 T12 items + 2 T11.

Options > Edit Items > Add

Enable "Use PTR Data", type the item id from the Wowhead URL, then press OK.

Hinalover should be working on adding them all.
Also the T12 mage bonuses are not modeled yet in current release, so you'll have to wait until that is added.

I'm finishing up on getting the 4.2 PvE gear in place and should have that posted later tonight. So the next release you will find All of the firelands and Molten Front gear in the database. I'll have the Ruthless (season 10) PvP gear imputed either this weekend or early next week.
If you are able to, I've uploaded a massive update to the item cache in the latest build that includes all T12, Motlen Front gear, Valor Gear, Avengers of Hyjal rep gear, and Firelands gear.
